definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: It is a preferred addictive for preparing over-based marine cylinder oil.
sentences.chinese: 是調製高鹼值船用汽缸油的首選添加劑。

sentences.english: The advantages of iron ore-coal pellets covered with iron-concentrate shell are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 論述了礦煤球團用鐵精礦及添加劑包殼的優點。

sentences.english: Some additives and preservatives are essential to keep foods quality and freshness.
sentences.chinese: 一些添加劑和防腐劑都必須保持食品的品質與鮮度。

sentences.english: Additive was an important for compound fertilizer.
sentences.chinese: 添加劑是復混肥料中不可忽視的組分。

sentences.english: China has banned its use as a pig feed additive.
sentences.chinese: 中國禁止使用氨哮素作爲豬料添加劑。

sentences.english: The methods of how to use additive reasonably and improve the quality of cathode coppers are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 重點論述了合理使用添加劑，提高陰極銅質量的方法。

sentences.english: More concerning is the presence of additives in some types of commercially prepared kimchi.
sentences.chinese: 更讓人擔憂的是韓國泡菜中的食品添加劑。
二氫吡啶是一種非營養性添加劑。

sentences.english: A novel grease additive derivative of thiadiazole was synthesized.
sentences.chinese: 合成了一種新型潤滑脂添加劑噻二唑衍生物。

sentences.english: L-ascorbic acid, trehalose, and glutin can significantly increase the Tg of wheat dough.
sentences.chinese: 食品添加劑對面團的玻璃化轉變溫度有顯著影響。

sentences.english: This is to compensate for the amount of fresh additives injected into the offgas stream.
sentences.chinese: 然後在尾氣氣流中補充一定數量的新鮮添加劑。

sentences.english: The thickeners are the main additives of water-base fracturing liquids.
sentences.chinese: 增稠劑是用於水基壓裂液的最主要添加劑。

sentences.english: Mixed food additives will present an advantageous performance than used them separately.
sentences.chinese: 食品添加劑復配使用比單個使用有優越的性能。

sentences.english: The antiwear capacity of a borate containing nitrogen was evaluated.
sentences.chinese: 對一種含氮硼酸酯添加劑的抗磨性能進行了評價。

sentences.english: A new method is introduced in this paper on bright quenching oil without additives.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了一種研製無添加劑光亮淬火油的新方法。

sentences.english: It spices up life, and who doesn’t need a little merry-making in their life?
sentences.chinese: 有誰的生活中不需要一點點“添加劑”呢？
